trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The humble shaman offers you a warm smile.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a tear of Yx'Lokwa.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_TODO_01<tab>Slay a djinn for its core.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the tear of Yx'Lokwa and core of the djinn to the humble shaman.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_001<tab>Tell me, do you believe in the power of prayer?
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_A1_000_001<tab>Why yes, I do.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_A1_000_002<tab>I beg your pardon?
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_002<tab>Would you do me the honor of joining me in a small prayer for good fortune?
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_003<tab>I intend to pray to the gods for good fortune. I would be most honored if you joined me.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_004<tab>We require two offerings to ensure our words reach to the heavens─a tear of Yx'Lokwa, and the heart of a djinn.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_005<tab>But your prayers are between you and the gods alone. As such, I cannot help you in preparing these offerings.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_006<tab>I will await your return. May the blessings of the wood keep you safe.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_007<tab>Procure a tear of Yx'Lokwa and the heart of a djinn, and we may deliver your prayers unto the heavens.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_010<tab>You have prepared your offerings, then?
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_011<tab>Very good.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_012<tab>Now, we take the tears in hand, like so. We then use the heart of the djinn to summon a breeze to carry the tears─and our prayers─into the firmament.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_013<tab>Even now I can feel the gods' protection.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_014<tab>I suspect you will have need of it in the days ahead.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_015<tab>I suspect you will have need of it in the Qitana Ravel.
TEXT_LUCKZF016_03475_CHARMER03475_000_016<tab>This too may prove useful in your travels. Until we meet again.
